description: From ring +â€Ž worm, being descriptive of what it looks like.

entries.meaning: A contagious fungal infection of the skin, characterised by ring-shaped discoloured patches, covered by vesicles or scales.
examples: In superficial mycoses infection is localised to the skin, the hair, and the nails. An example is ringworm or tinea, an infection of the skin by a dermatophyte.
